main event: An observation of a large planet-like object moving and brightening in North Glen, Colorado on 23 January 1967.
interesting points: The object was visible for about 30 seconds before disappearing.,The object appeared bright during the daytime.,Witness reported observing the object with binoculars.,The weather was clear at the time of observation.,The object was described as round and white with a bright corona.
witness description: Male, age 31, reported the observation to the Air Force.
